type.description:
## Riding Recursive

---


[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/riding_recursive)

Checks if the actor entity is riding the target entity, regardless of where the target entity is in the riding chain. 

Type ID: `origins:riding_recursive`

---

### Examples

```json
"bientity_condition": {
	"type": "origins:riding_recursive"
}
```

title: Riding Recursive (Bi-entity Condition Type) date: 2021-10-08

Riding Recursive

Bi-entity Condition Type

Checks if the actor entity is riding the target entity, regardless of where the target entity is in the riding chain.

Type ID: origins:riding_recursive

Fields

None.

Examples

"bientity_condition": {
	"type": "origins:riding_recursive"
}
